data.title: Government of Saskatchewan
data.meta_description:
Government of Saskatchewan | 56,793 followers on LinkedIn. Keeping you informed about government career opportunities.

Terms of Use: https://saskatchewan.ca/social-media | Welcome to the Government of Saskatchewan’s LinkedIn Page!

This page has information about our current career opportunities, who our teams are, and why we are the choice for your next career adventure.

When you join the Government of Saskatchewan Public Service, you’ll be part of a community that values diversity, innovation, and collaboration.
data.text:
Join the Ministry of SaskBuilds and Procurement as a Priority Projects Consultant and lead high-impact, special projects that drive innovation and positivity! Collaborate with senior executives and stakeholders to develop policies and frameworks and manage exciting projects from start to finish. Apply for this opportunity today! Job Title: Consultant, Priority Project Support Permanent Full-Time Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Saskbuilds and Procurement Closing Date: August 29, 2024 Competition #: HUM013945 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit https://bit.ly/3yYLSS7

Join the Ministry of Energy and Resources as an Executive Coordinator! You’ll provide vital support to the Assistant Deputy Minister, handling everything from expense processing to document preparation and office management. If you’re organized, experienced in office administration, and ready to thrive in a fast-paced environment, apply today! Job Title: Executive Coordinator Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Energy and Resources Closing Date: September 6, 2024 Competition #: ADM024354 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/4fVC6Ro

Join our team at the Ministry of Advanced Education as a Business Analyst! You’ll identify business needs, recommend innovative solutions, and ensure our systems meet top standards. Collaborate with teams to support system enhancements and new programs. Apply today! Job Title: Business Analyst Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Advanced Education Closing Date: September 10, 2024 Competition #: INF004665 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3yWWBwq

Join our team at the Ministry of Corrections, Policing and Public Safety as a Communications Consultant! You’ll develop and implement strategic communication plans, manage diverse projects, and provide counsel to senior officials. If you’re creative, proactive, and results-oriented, apply today! Job Title: Communications Consultant Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Corrections, Policing and Public Safety Closing Date: September 11, 2024 Competition #: COM001959 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3T938ef

Join our team as a Senior Program Consultant, where you’ll lead and support mental health and addiction initiatives across Saskatchewan. Use your expertise to shape policies, drive strategic planning, and collaborate with key stakeholders to enhance mental health services. Apply today! Job Title: Senior Program Consultant Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Health Closing Date: September 11, 2024 Competition #: EMP000974 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3ATm6za

Join our team at the Mental Health and Addictions Branch as a Program Consultant! Lead policy development, strategic planning, and support mental health initiatives across Saskatchewan. If you’re a leader ready to make a difference, apply today! Job Title: Program Consultant Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Health Closing Date: September 11, 2024 Competition #: EMP000973 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3X6J1Pj

Join our team at the Ministry of Trade and Export Development as a Planning and Performance Consultant! Lead strategic planning, program reviews, and continuous improvement initiatives while supporting Ministry leadership. If you’re proactive, organized, and ready to make an impact, apply today! Job Title: Planning and Performance Consultant Permanent Opportunity - Regina, SK Ministry: Trade and Export Development Closing Date: September 10, 2024 Competition #: CON002805 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3MmVV6z

Join the Lands Branch with the Ministry of Agriculture as a Land Management Specialist and make a difference in managing Saskatchewan’s crown lands! You’ll work with diverse clients, enjoy the great outdoors, and use modern technology to ensure compliance and land health. If you have a degree in Agriculture or Environmental Sciences and love working with people, apply today! Job Title: Land Management Specialist Permanent Opportunity - Weyburn or Regina, SK Ministry: Agriculture Closing Date: September 3, 2024 Competition #: AGR000876 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/4dFQYBY

Carol-ann Decker is the Executive Director of Indigenous and Northern Services for the Ministry of Immigration and Career Training. Carol-ann and her team work with Indigenous people in the province, helping them prepare for and secure employment, with a particular emphasis on the natural resource sector. She also helps Indigenous-led businesses find the workforce they need. What Carol-ann loves most about her job is the people and the purpose it brings. The work she does supports individuals as they grow and develop in their careers, which provides them with fulfillment, a sense of belonging and hope for their futures. Visit Saskatchewan.ca/careers for career information. #Saskatchewan #jobopportunities #jobs #career #IBelieveInPublicService

Join the Ministry of Highways as a Capital Planning Coordinator and play a pivotal role in shaping our capital programs! You’ll oversee our capital forecast database, perform detailed expenditure analysis, and collaborate with internal managers to support program delivery. Apply today! Job Title: Capital Planning Coordinator Permanent Opportunity - Regina or Saskatoon, SK Ministry: Highways Closing Date: September 10, 2024 Competition #: FIN005857 To learn more or to apply for this opportunity, visit: https://bit.ly/3Z2E3We
